title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Mathematics Learning Improvement Strategies Through Teacher Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Enhancing learner-centered lesson design capabilities through comparative analysis of teacher collaboration policies in Hong Kong and Singapore
Analyzing the impact of cultural values (uncertainty avoidance, power distance) on teacher collaboration

Learners analyze the three core elements of professional capital theory (knowledge, social capital, human capital), develop two actionable strategies (e.g., mentoring program design, knowledge-sharing workshop operation) to improve mathematics learning, and submit a detailed implementation plan including stakeholder assignment, budget estimation (up to 5 million KRW), and weekly schedules within four weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
